      • setData

        参数:

      • setData

        public final void setData(java.util.List<QMUISection<H,T>> data,
                          boolean onlyMutateState)
        see setData(List, boolean, boolean)
        参数:
        data - section list
        onlyMutateState - This is used to backup for next diff. True to use shallow copy, false tp use deep copy.

      • setData

        public final void setData(java.util.List<QMUISection<H,T>> data,
                          boolean onlyMutateState,
                          boolean checkLock)
        set the new data to the adapter, this will trigger diff between new data and old data. you should pay attention to the state of your data in memory. if new data and old data reference to the same data in memory, the diff will fail. This is why the parameter onlyMutateState exists: if onlyMutateState == true, shallow copy is used to backup for next diff. You must sure H, T in memory is different between old data and new data if onlyMutateState == false, deep copy is used to backup for next diff. It's safe, but it will consume unnecessary performance if your new data is different in memory.
        参数:
        data - section list
        onlyMutateState - This is used to backup for next diff. True to use shallow copy, false tp use deep copy.
        checkLock - check section lock

      • beforeDiffInSet

        protected void beforeDiffInSet(java.util.List<QMUISection<H,T>> oldData,
                               java.util.List<QMUISection<H,T>> newData)
        Subclasses override this method to fill some info to new section list if need. For example, assume the user expand some section by click event, these action while modify old section list, but the new section list knows nothing for user action. so this method is a chance to synchronize some info from old section list.
        参数:
        oldData - old section list
        newData - new section list

      • setDataWithoutDiff

        public final void setDataWithoutDiff(java.util.List<QMUISection<H,T>> data,
                                     boolean onlyMutateState)
        参数:
        data - section list
        onlyMutateState - this is used to backup for next diff. True to use shallow copy, false tp use deep copy.

      • setDataWithoutDiff

        public final void setDataWithoutDiff(java.util.List<QMUISection<H,T>> data,
                                     boolean onlyMutateState,
                                     boolean checkLock)
        same as setData(List, boolean), but do't use DiffUtil, use #notifyDataSetChanged() directly.
        参数:
        data - section list
        onlyMutateState - this is used to backup for next diff. True to use shallow copy, false tp use deep copy.
        checkLock - check section lock

      • refreshCustomData

        public void refreshCustomData()
        section data is not changed, only custom item index may changed, so we also need to regenerate index

        public void scrollToSectionHeader(QMUISection<H,T> targetSection,
                                  boolean scrollToTop)
        scroll to special section header
        参数:
        targetSection -
        scrollToTop - True to scroll to recyclerView Top, false to scroll to visible area.

      • scrollToSectionItem

        public void scrollToSectionItem(QMUISection<H,T> targetSection,
                                T targetItem,
                                boolean scrollToTop)
        scroll to special section item
        参数:
        targetSection - section info. if your items are not repeated in different section, you can use null for this method.
        targetItem - item info
        scrollToTop - True to scroll to recyclerView Top, false to scroll to visible area.
